version_description:
Top o’ the mornin’ to ya! Here’s what’s new in our latest update!

ST. PATRICK’S DAY EVENT
Collect shamrocks to unlock new costumes, mystery items, and the Golden Rainbow Jetpack in our Irish extravaganza!

NEW BUNDLE: PADDY’S PACK
Treat yourself to some coins, the Leprechaun Outfit, and two exclusive items: The Celtic Teleporter & Pot o’ Gold Jetpack!

Event ends March 27. Luck be with you, lads!

Get egg-cited! A new event is here!

EASTER EGGSTRAVAGANZA
Collect eggs to unlock special prizes like the brand new Bunny Suit!

LIL CHOMPER VEHICLE SKIN
This robo-rabbit only cares about two things in life: chomping and stomping!

NEW BUNDLE: BARRY’S BASKET
Eggstraordinary savings on rare and exclusive items for a limited time!

Event ends April 23rd. Hop to it!

Event ends April 23rd. Hop to it!

Shiver me timbers! This update is all about pirates!

PIRATE EVENT
Line your pockets with hidden treasure and special prizes!

MONTY THE MACAW
It’s a bird! It’s a plane! Wait… we were right the first time!

THE BRAZEN BARNACLE
Sail the seven seas with this battle-tested pirate ship!

ISLAND PARADISE
The perfect place to soak up some sun or bury your loot!

Event ends June 25. Fire in the hole!

Improved optimisation and general bug fixes.
Improved optimisation and general bug fixes.

Up high! Down low! All the bugs have got to go!
In this update we've used SAM's giant robotic arm to swat away bugs and improve the gameplay experience.
Let us know if you encounter any issues and we'll do our best to get them fixed as soon as possible.
High five for science!

iPhone X support and general bug fixes.
iPhone X support and general bug fixes.
This update includes a number of bug fixes and minor improvements. As always, keep the feedback coming!
This update includes a number of bug fixes and minor improvements. As always, keep the feedback coming!

This update is laying the groundwork for some exciting and super secret changes coming your way in 2018.
Update your game today and stay tuned for more content drops as we continue to support Jetpack Joyride well into the future.
We'll have more to share with you soon!

Event ends April 16th. Hop to it!

Minor game tweaks and improvements.
Minor game tweaks and improvements.

Hey, Joyriders! We’re currently running a series of experiments which will allow us to test new or partially developed features before we make them official.

Not everyone will see these changes though so don’t be alarmed if your game looks the same as always. Everything is assigned at random and you might be selected for the next one!

Hey, Joyriders! We’re currently running a series of experiments which will allow us to test new or partially developed features before we make them official.

Not everyone will see these changes though so don’t be alarmed if your game looks the same as always. Everything is assigned at random and you might be selected for the next one!

NEW Jetpack - Holy cow! The udderly ridiculous 'Big Bertha Jetpack' is out now! 
BONUS Background - Zip by the peaceful green pastures of Bertha's home while avoiding the chaos of the lab.

NEW Jetpack - Holy cow! The udderly ridiculous 'Big Bertha Jetpack' is out now! 
BONUS Background - Zip by the peaceful green pastures of Bertha's home while avoiding the chaos of the lab.
We've addressed some minor technical issues to improve performance across the board. Thanks for playing and keep the feedback coming!
We've addressed some minor technical issues to improve performance across the board. Thanks for playing and keep the feedback coming!

What’s new you ask?

•We fixed some crashes related to S.A.M rewards
•Updated Push Notifications
•Adjusted appearance of new Hills Background (now you can actually see the zappers!)

What’s new you ask?

•We fixed some crashes related to S.A.M rewards
•Updated Push Notifications
•Adjusted appearance of new Hills Background (now you can actually see the zappers!)

HALLOWEEN EVENT - Find out what’s got the scientists scrambling…
• Zombies, Werewolves, A BONE DRAGON! There’s plenty of exclusive Halloween rewards to unlock – collect the pumpkins now! 

BONE DRAGON 
• Dragged from the depths of death… Legitimate Research welcomes its most ferocious creation to date, the Bone Dragon - ride it now!

NEW BACKGROUND - 'The Scare Lair' 
•This location was known to host the most terrifying Monsters to walk the Earth… then they met Barry (and his shotgun).

REAPER ROBES 
•Dress head-to-toe as the most menacing being to ever visit the lab - Scythe included!

*Event ends November 7th. Enter at your own risk

HALLOWEEN EVENT - Find out what’s got the scientists scrambling…

NEW BACKGROUND - 'The Scare Lair'

REAPER ROBES 
•Dress head-to-toe as the most menacing being to ever visit the lab - Scythe included!

*Event ends November 7th. Enter at your own risk

NEW COSTUME
Play as the infamous Raskull King from our new game Magic Brick Wars. This costume is free to unlock!

WEEKLY EVENTS ARE BACK!
Zappy Bird and Cut and Run events will continue to cycle weekly until Christmas!
General bug fixes and minor improvements.

We've squashed some bugs, and made some overall improvements to the game!
- Fixed crash with interstitial ads
We've squashed some bugs and made some overall improvements to the game!

NEW WEEKLY EVENTS!

Get to the top of the leader board in TWO of your favorite events!

MASTER THE PROFIT BIRD
Test your skills in the ZAPPY BIRD event! Navigate your way through a maze of zappers to get a high score and win sweet rewards!

FRUIT NINJA IN JETPACK JOYRIDE?!
Slice and dice your way through the lab in the CUT & RUN event! Race against the clock and collect as much fruit as you can to unlock EXCLUSIVE PRIZES!

Each mode is available for 1 week at a time – DOWNLOAD NOW!
We've addressed some minor technical issues to improve performance across the board. Thanks for playing and keep the feedback coming!

Get Egg-cited, the NEW EASTER EVENT is here!

Chomping robo-rabbits, screaming chooks and a steam-rolling chocolate machine are just the beginning!

PLAY NOW TO UNLOCK EXCLUSIVE EASTER PRIZES!

● Easter Exclusive Vehicles
● Brand NEW Jetpacks and Outfits
● NEW Chocolate S.A.M Skin

Join in on the chocolate-filled fun now! Available for a limited time.

NEW PIRATE EVENT
Blimey! The Pirates have landed…
● Your treasure awaits! Collect the Golden Skulls to unlock new and exciting loot!

NEW COSTUME, JETPACK & VEHICLE
● Swashbuckling S.A.M, a trident bearing Greek God, and the legendary ‘Kraken’ sea-monster are just the beginning!

Available for a limited time, play now!
We've squashed some bugs and made some overall improvements to the game!

NEW S.A.M SKINS + MUSIC
● You can now purchase your favorite S.A.M skins in-game (music included)! Head to the ‘vehicles’ section to check them out!

GLOBAL LEADERBOARD
● Find out how you rank against players all around the world!

IMPROVED RESULTS + MISSIONS
● We’ve improved the way we communicate missions & levelling up! Also, we’ve re-designed the results screen.

CHINESE NEW YEAR EVENT!
Celebrate 2019 the right way! Collect the ‘Red Envelopes’ to unlock new & exclusive Chinese New Year prizes!

• Unleash fiery chaos with the fan-favourite Chinese New Year Dragon skin!
• It’s a bird! It’s a pig! It’s super-! Oh wait… it’s just a flying pig. Play with the brand new ‘Truffles’ vehicle skin!
• Unlock the explosive Firecracker Jetpack – exclusive to Chinese New Year!
• Collect them all! Dress the part with a new Chinese New Year costume!

CHINESE NEW YEAR EVENT!
Celebrate 2019 the right way! Collect the ‘Red Envelopes’ to unlock new & exclusive Chinese New Year prizes!

• Unleash fiery chaos with the fan-favourite Chinese New Year Dragon skin!
• It’s a bird! It’s a pig! It’s super-! Oh wait… it’s just a flying pig. Play with the brand new ‘Truffles’ vehicle skin!
• Unlock the explosive Firecracker Jetpack – exclusive to Chinese New Year!
• Collect them all! Dress the part with a new Chinese New Year costume!

ST. PATRICK’S DAY EVENT
The St. Patrick’s Day event is here! Collect event tokens to unlock your exclusive rewards.

3 EXCLUSIVE JETPACKS
The brand new ‘Sir. Einhorn’ Jetpack, Pot of Gold Jetpack & Golden Rainbow Jetpack are all exclusive to the St Patrick’s day Event. Play now to claim yours!

CELTIC TELEPORTER
The electrifying ‘Celtic Teleporter’ is back, for a limited time! Grab yours now!

PLUS a new SAM Skin, crazy costumes, earth-shattering ‘shamrocks’… Join in on the chaotic fun now!

This update contains a fix for a nasty bug that was causing the game to freeze up after seeing an ad.
We've also fixed issues with the Halloween Event and Halloween Bundle pop ups.
Thanks for playing Jetpack!

NEW COSTUME
Play as the infamous Raskull King from our new game Magic Brick Wars. This costume is free to unlock!

WEEKLY EVENTS ARE BACK!
Zappy Bird and Cut and Run events will continue to cycle weekly until Christmas!

ST. PATRICK’S DAY EVENT
The St. Patrick’s Day event is here! Collect event tokens to unlock your exclusive rewards.

3 EXCLUSIVE JETPACKS
The brand new ‘Sir. Einhorn’ Jetpack, Pot of Gold Jetpack & Golden Rainbow Jetpack are all exclusive to the St Patrick’s day Event. Play now to claim yours!

PLUS a new SAM Skin, crazy costumes, earth-shattering ‘shamrocks’… Join in on the chaotic fun now!

This update contains a fix for a nasty bug that was causing the game to freeze up after seeing an ad.
We've also fixed issues with the Halloween Event and Halloween Bundle pop ups.
Thanks for playing Jetpack!

'BACK TO THE FUTURE' EVENT
Tear through the iconic streets of ‘Hill Valley’ as you blast your way through time.
Play now for an exhilarating new game mode, electrifying jetpack, costumes, vehicles, and much more!

NEW MODE – Defy time itself! Collect Flux Capacitors to extend your run. How long will you last?
DELOREAN TIME MACHINE – Strap yourself in… this baby shoots flames! Hit 88mph and you’ll rip through time!
HOVERBOARD – Skate through the streets in style. Escaping death has never looked cooler!

NEW CHRISTMAS EVENT
It’s Christmas already? That means presents right?!
Collect the flying ‘baubles’ to unlock 7 exclusive Christmas Gifts in the brand NEW Christmas Event!

YOUR GIFTS
This Christmas, unlock: A ‘lit’ Jetpack, Christmas themed outfits, NEW unreleased costumes and a PREMIUM vehicle – all for FREE!

CHRISTMAS WONDERLAND
The scientists went overboard… it’s sickening. New S.A.M skin, ‘Winter Wonderland’ background and deadly Flying Snowballs! Check it out now!

The brand new ‘Sir. Einhorn’ Jetpack, Pot of Gold Jetpack & Golden Rainbow Jetpack are all exclusive to the St Patrick’s day Event. Play now to claim yours!

CELTIC TELEPORTER
The electrifying ‘Celtic Teleporter’ is back, for a limited time! Grab yours now!

PLUS a new SAM Skin, crazy costumes, earth-shattering ‘shamrocks’… Join in on the chaotic fun now!

NEW WEEKLY EVENTS!

Get to the top of the leader board in TWO of your favorite events!

MASTER THE PROFIT BIRD
Test your skills in the ZAPPY BIRD event! Navigate your way through a maze of zappers to get a high score and win sweet rewards!

FRUIT NINJA IN JETPACK JOYRIDE?!
Slice and dice your way through the lab in the CUT & RUN event! Race against the clock and collect as much fruit as you can to unlock EXCLUSIVE PRIZES!

Each mode is available for 1 week at a time – DOWNLOAD NOW!

BACK TO THE FUTURE EVENT!
Tear through the streets of ‘Hill Valley’. Unlock rare prizes such as an electrifying jetpack, iconic costumes, the new ‘Steam Powered S.A.M’ skin & more!

NEW GAME MODE – Defy time itself! Collect tokens to extend your run. How long will you last?

DELOREAN TIME MACHINE –Hit 88mph in this vehicle, and you’ll rip through time!

HOVERBOARD – Skate the streets in style. Escaping death has never looked cooler!

EVENT LEADERBOARD – Play against others from all around the world!

ST. PATRICK’S DAY EVENT
The St. Patrick’s Day event is here! Collect event tokens to unlock your exclusive rewards.

3 EXCLUSIVE JETPACKS
The ‘Sir. Einhorn’ Jetpack, Pot of Gold Jetpack & Golden Rainbow Jetpack are all exclusive to the St Patrick’s day Event. Play now to claim yours!

CELTIC TELEPORTER
The electrifying ‘Celtic Teleporter’ is back, for a limited time! Grab yours now!
